name: Night Owl
ability: Once, during the day, visit the Storyteller: you die and tonight will be skipped, but the Demon may act twice tomorrow.

name: Carpenter
ability: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): if not the Demon, they don't wake tonight.

name: Author
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player (not yourself) and a Good character they become (if not in play).

name: Templar
ability: You start knowing two people, both of which are not and are immune to becoming the Demon. Each night, choose someone: they cannot become the Demon tonight.

name: Clown
ability: Each night*, choose someone: you learn a riddle about them.

name: Statistician
ability: Each night, learn a statistic concerning the gamestate.

name: Chamberlain
ability: Each night, choose someone: when you die, you learn how many are Evil.

name: Optimist
ability: If you are mad about nothing going wrong, something good might happen. You learn a clue about this.

name: Lawyer
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player to be safe from execution the following day. If they are executed and it fails, you have your ability back.

name: Jailor
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: you learn their character and they might die.

name: Demonologist
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player: you become their alignment and may choose a character of that alignment (not a Demon) to gain the ability of.

name: Corsair
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they and only they die.

name: Shipwright
ability: Once per game, at during the day, visit the Storyteller to learn which alignment the Storyteller believes is winning: good, evil, or neither. If your team is losing, you may propose a change to the gamestate that the Storyteller may decide to veto.

name: Navigator
ability: Each night*, you provide the Storyteller a statement that is either true or false: they will provide a statement that is of the same truthfulness.

name: Quartermaster
ability: You and an aligned player start knowing each other.

name: Jester
ability: You believe you are, have the ability of, and register as an Evil Demon. [-1 Outsider, -1 Demon]

name: Trapezist
ability: Each night*, if either of your neighbors are drunk or poisoned, you die. You learn who was drunk or poisoned and how.

name: Turncoat
ability: You believe you are and have the ability of an in-play Minion. You and the Minion you believe you are do not know the Demon and other Minions, and vice versa. You learn you are the Turncoat if you die.

name: Officer
ability: Each night*, choose someone: their ability will be redirected to help their team. Targeting a role that acts during the day will redirect if they use their ability the coming day. Your ability may fail if it causes a paradox.

name: Shuttle Driver
ability: Each night, choose a player: learn who they should choose to best help their team.

name: Founder
ability: Every night*, someone knows you are the Founder. [+The Mercenary]

otherNightReminder: Wake and collectively choose a player
name: Acolyte
ability: Each night*, living Acolytes choose a player & learn 1 character for each, 1 being correct. 1 Acolyte might be evil [+1 or +2 Acolytes]

name: Medic
ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they cannot die tonight.
flavor: The animals of this woods are dangerous. The wounds I've had to patch up...

name: Ranger
ability: Each night, choose a player: learn a player they chose. If they chose nobody or are the Demon, this info is arbitrary.
flavor: Leave nothing but footprints, they say. Well, tire tracks are close enough.

name: Falconer
ability: Each night, choose a living player. If your previously chosen player is dead, learn their character.
flavor: The stench of death really gets the falcons in a stir. They often hunt the smaller scavengers that surround corpses.

name: Bird Watcher
ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn a hint about their character.
flavor: What birds fly above someone can tell a great lot about what they're up to.

name: Hawkeye
ability: Each night*, choose a player: learn on a scale of 1-5 how much they lied yesterday. If they didn't lie, this info is arbitrary.
flavor: Constantly watching is the best way to sniff out lies.

firstNightReminder: Learn the character type of the marked and then move one clockwise
otherNightReminder: Learn the character type of the marked and then move one clockwise
name: Census Officer
ability: One player starts marked with 'Census'. Each night, learn the character type that is marked, and then the mark moves once clockwise (skipping Travelers).

name: Camper
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from Minions.
flavor: Sometimes a campfire is the easiest way to keep the evil ones at bay.

name: Rescue Pilot
ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): all other players who chose them are drunk until dawn.

otherNightReminder: An Evil player dies if you are chosen by a Demon
name: Cryptozoologist
ability: The first night* the Demon chooses you, they don't and an Evil player dies.
flavor: I'll find it. Don't you even question. See this footprint, here? Proof!

name: Consultant
ability: Each night, choose a Townsfolk: you learn a piece of advice for them.
flavor: The book. The book knows it all.

name: Coroner
ability: Each night*, choose a dead player: You learn if they died to a Good or Evil ability and you learn one Good and one Evil character, one of which is correct.
flavor: How someone died can tell you quite a bit about the motives of the killer.

name: Vigilante
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: if not the Demon, they die.
flavor: Sometimes you need to take justice into your own hands.

name: Ghost
ability: On the first night, you die.

name: Captain
ability: On your first day, all players vote for a player: they become the Captain and you change characters. You may nominate twice.

name: Grandmother [OMR]
ability: You start knowing a good player & character. If you die, they die at midnight.

name: Sailor [OMR]
ability: Each night, choose whether you or or a random good player is drunk until dusk. You can not die.

name: Preacher [OMR]
ability: Each night, choose a player: all chosen Minions know who you are & have no ability until you die.

name: Exorcist [OMR]
ability: Each night*, choose a player: the Demon, if chosen, knows who you are & does not wake tonight.

name: Innkeeper [OMR]
ability: Each night*, choose two players: they are safe from the Demon tonight, but 1 is drunk until dusk.

name: Chambermaid [OMR]
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they wake tonight, you die.

name: Gambler [OMR]
ability: Each night*, choose a player & their character: if you guess wrong, you die.

name: Professor [OMR]
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: if they are a Townsfolk, they are resurrected & regain their ability.

name: Moonchild [OMR]
ability: When you or 1 of your alive neighbors is executed, publicly choose a player who voted: if evil, they die at midnight.

name: Minstrel [OMR]
ability: At night, if an evil player was executed today, all players [not latecomers] are drunk until dusk.

name: Tea Lady [OMR]
ability: If both your alive neighbors are good, they can not die.

name: Choirboy [OMR]
ability: You can not die. If you imply you are the Choirboy, lose your ability.

name: Fool [OMR]
ability: The first time you die, you do not.

name: Wiretap (D)
ability: You start knowing 2 allied players. When they both die, you learn their characters.

name: Wiretap (F)
ability: You start knowing 2 opposite players. When you die, you learn the Evil character.

name: Double Agent
ability: The Demon sees you instead of a Minion. That Minion does not know the Evil team.

name: Sleeper
ability: You think you are an in-play Minion. Neither of you know the Evil team. If you are “mad” about your character token, you learn the in-play Demon tonight.

name: Jurist
ability: Each night, choose a player and learn their character. Good living players register falsely.

name: Freelancer
ability: Each night, choose a Good character and learn who it is (arbitrary if not in play). Once per game, learn falsely.

name: Blacklister
ability: Each night*, choose an Evil character. You learn a character they whispered today (arbitrary if not in play).

name: Black Ops
ability: Each night*, you learn whether you whispered the Demon today.

name: Populist
ability: Each night*, you learn a character who was “mad” about being the Populist today.

name: Diplomat
ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn something about each player you whispered today, in no particular order.

name: Eavesdropper
ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to broker a deal between 2 other players (different from yesterday). Non-Travelers who break the deal today are drunk until dawn.

name: Symbologist
ability: If you die at night, you may guess everyone's character. You learn how many you got correct.

name: Truther
ability: You have 3 Townsfolk abilities, but 1 malfunctions. You also register as the functioning Townsfolk.

name: Ambassador
ability: You are immune to all abilities. If the Demon chooses not to act, you malfunction this game. Once per game at night*, you may become a Traveler.

name: LIZARD (T)
ability: Choose an amount of Base Four characters of each character type: you have a mutation of one of their abilities.

name: Scavenger
ability: You have the ability of the first evil player that dies. While all evil players are alive, your ability malfuntions.

name: White Knight
ability: Any action that targets or registers you might target or register an evil player instead, even if you are dead.

name: Fish Vendor
ability: Each night, choose a unique player: you gain a piece of advice (involving them) to help your team win. If you chose an Evil player, you are drunk.

firstNightReminder: Learns a false copy of the Grimoire
otherNightReminder: Learns a false copy of the Grimoire
name: Sculptor
ability: Each night, learn a Grimoire that shares exactly three tokens with the true Grimoire.

name: Teacher
ability: You start knowing a Good player who has an Evil neighbor.

name: Shikari
ability: A Minion and the evil team don't learn each other until you lose your ability. Each night, choose a player: If the player is the affected minion, they choose a player: if they do not choose you, they lose their ability permanently.

name: Rosemary
ability: You start knowing one Good player. If you nominate and execute them, you learn the Demon is one of two players. If you are mad that you are the Rosemary, you might lose your ability.

name: Enchanter
ability: Each night, choose a player and a character: if they are mad that they are this character tomorrow, their ability may trigger twice until the next dawn.

name: Historian
ability: Each night*, choose a player: you learn the most important thing they've done to help their team.

name: Insomniac
ability: The first time you die at night, you don't, and a good player learns who you are.

name: Crusader
ability: Each night, choose a player: Minions whose actions that target or register them are are drunk. You are safe from Minions.

name: Therapist
ability: Each night* choose a living player. Learn which character impacted them the most through an ability. If none, learn false info.

name: Combatant
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they cannot die until dawn. A player who chooses your chosen may player dies (once). You are sober and healthy.
